body_html: I think using configure is also the best thing to do as well. configure can find a way to plugin the location of swig through command line or generate an external local repository for swig. It needs to configure SWIG_LIB as well.
body_text: I think using configure is also the best thing to do as well. configure can find a way to plugin the location of swig through command line or generate an external local repository for swig. It needs to configure SWIG_LIB as well.
body: I think using configure is also the best thing to do as well. configure can find a way to plugin the location of swig through command line or generate an external local repository for swig. It needs to configure SWIG_LIB as well.
